articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: Apple Intelligence features probably won’t launch in the EU in 2024 - The Verge
articles.description: Apple says the Digital Markets Act’s interoperability requirements could delay EU rollouts of features like iPhone mirroring and Apple Intelligence AI.
articles.content:
Apple may delay AI features in the EU because of its big tech law
Apple may delay AI features in the EU because of its big tech law
